title: Told client needs to restart, then nothing.
body: I went to play after the patch hit but the only thing that comes up is the league of legends logo, it then dissapears and nothing happens. I checked my task selector but league never seems to launch during this time.

replies.body: Bro its same but mein keeps downloading for ever i mean it starts the client tell me i need to to leave ro do an update when i do it downloads for ever and i have this problem in both my computers

The patcher not launching can happen if your security settings updated to block it.  Firstly, give your PC a restart in case something crashed in the background.  Then run through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up.  Keep in mind as well we had a patch overnight, so there may have been some shot downtime.  I hope that helps!
Browse to lol.launcher.admin (typically in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) Run lol.launcher.admin and let it update.. works for me.
And now am in the same boat as you the update is finished but i dont seem to be able to start the game logo then nothing happen
